name: Drom
description:
As a 16 year old this is the first game (if you can call it that) I have ever distributed. Developing it was more of a learning process for me rather than making something more enjoyable or detailed since it took me less than 20 hours total to make. Drom is a poorly interpreted game about a series of dreams I had one night. Through making it i learned about UI design, scripting, animation, and more. I also made all of the music myself.

There's not much to it; walk around, enjoy the scenery, and relax.
